name: Heavenly Magic Richy Rich
description: Heavenly Magic Richy Rich is a Rich premium Dairy, Vanilla ice cream with Chocolate sauce, Cashew & toffee. It is made from 100% Sri Lankan Fresh Cow's milk. Suitable for Vegetarians. Rs. 50 cents from every 1L of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education.      *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
